title: Tiara Girl
description: Follow the lives of best friends, Stacy, Ashley and Nirvana as they compete to be the newest Tiara Girl, a spokesmodel for the popular clothing company, owned by Jillian Scarlett. Each girl starts with her own reason for competing but during the journey, everything changes and they discover inner strength, new friends and what is really important to them. Although written as a teen novel, Tiara Girl is a fun read for readers of all ages.
author: Jill DeChello
